# DeepRecall

> Recursive reasoning engine for vector databases. Uses MIT's RLM to let LLMs search, reason, search again, and repeat -- replacing single-pass RAG with multi-hop recursive retrieval.

## Docs

- [Quickstart](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/quickstart.md): Install and first query in 5 lines
- [API Reference](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/api-reference.md): Every class, method, and parameter
- [Architecture](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/architecture.md): How the recursive reasoning loop works
- [Vector Stores](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/vectorstores.md): ChromaDB, Milvus, Qdrant, Pinecone, FAISS adapters
- [Framework Adapters](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/adapters.md): LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI-compatible API
- [LLM Backends](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/backends.md): OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and more
- [Budget Guardrails](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/guardrails.md): Token, time, cost, and search limits
- [Caching](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/caching.md): InMemory, Disk (SQLite), Redis
- [Callbacks](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/callbacks.md): Console, JSONL, Usage, OpenTelemetry
- [Reranking](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/reranking.md): Cohere, CrossEncoder
- [Async & Concurrency](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/async.md): AsyncDeepRecall, thread safety
- [CLI Reference](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/cli.md): init, ingest, query, serve, delete, status, benchmark
- [Server](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/docs/server.md): OpenAI-compatible REST API with auth and rate limiting

## Optional

- [Changelog](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md): Version history
- [Contributing](https://github.com/kothapavan1998/deeprecall/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md): Development setup and PR guidelines
- [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/deeprecall/): Package page
